summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the proposed Charter Amendments contemplated by Resolutions 22724, 22732, and 22735, and submitting the same to the qualified electors (voters) of The City of Seattle at a special municipal election to be held therein on November 3, 1970; requiring the City Clerk to certify to the Director of the Department of Records and Elections of King County as required by law said proposed amendments in the form of specified ballot titles and said amendments in full, and providing for publication thereof.
